name: GetUserAudioConferences
description:
Retrieve a list of user's personal audio conference accounts.

Call this tool to obtain a list of a user's personal audio conference (PAC) accounts. It is useful for users with Pro or higher Zoom plans who want to manage or monitor their audio conference capabilities. Use 'me' as the userId for user-level apps.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The user's ID or email. Use 'me' for user-level apps to represent the current user.

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
